Title: Promotes understanding, awareness and enforcement of animal crimes laws; repealer
Summary: Promotes understanding, awareness and enforcement of animal crime laws.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law and the penal law, in relation to promoting understanding, awareness and enforcement of animal crimes laws; and to repeal sections 351, 353, 353-a, 353-b, 353-d, 355, 360, 361, 362 and subdivision 8 of section 374 of the agriculture and markets law relating thereto
